articles.title: Greaves Cotton soars 11%, hits all-time high; stock up 40% so far in Jan - Business Standard
articles.description: The stock has been in demand after the company's arm Greaves Electric Mobility reported strong sales for December 2021
articles.content: Shares of Greaves Cotton hit an all-time high at Rs 193.30, surging 11 per cent on the BSE in Monday’s intra-day trade on the back of heavy volumes. The stock surpassed its previous high of Rs 184.25… [+4440 chars]
